data.title: Post Malone Unveils Official Tracklist For 'F-1 Trillion'
data.meta_description: Post Malone has locked in just about every A-lister in country music for his new album that's dropping in two weeks.
data.text:
More Post Malone

After a leaked list of the features set to be included on Post Maloneâs forthcoming debut country album, F-1 Trillion, made waves on Countrytown last week, the singer has finally revealed what we can expect from his new LP.

Unveiling the official tracklist via a dramatic full-page layout in partnership with The Tennessean, the rapper-turned-country star has honoured the genre heâs entering and is having a little fun with his album rollout.

Now that weâve seen the official tracklist â which Post Malone also shared on Instagram with the caption âAugust 16thâ, reminding fans of the albumâs release date â we know that the leak was accurate when it came to the artists listed, but the order was all over the place. While many of the songs include features, three solo songs are also on the record: What Donât Belong To Me, Right About You, and the album closer, Yours.

Post Malone opens F-1 Trillion with Wrong Ones, a collaboration with Tim McGraw. The album features previously released duets with Morgan Wallen, Blake Shelton, and Luke Combs, and much more will follow.

Somehow, Post Malone has locked in just about every A-lister in country music for his new album, including Dolly Parton, Chris Stapleton, Lainey Wilson, Billy Strings, Brad Paisley, Jelly Roll, Sierra Ferrell, ERNEST, HARDY, and Hank Williams Jr.

You can find the complete tracklist below. F-1 Trillion is available to pre-order or pre-save here.

Join our community with our FREE weekly newsletter

Post Malone - F-1 Trillion Tracklist:

1. Wrong Ones (feat. Tim McGraw)

2. Finer Things (feat. Hank Williams Jr.)

3. I Had Some Help (feat. Morgan Wallen)

4. Pour Me A Drink (feat. Blake Shelton)

5. Have The Heart (feat. Dolly Parton)

6. What Don't Belong To Me

7. Goes Without Saying (feat. Brad Paisley)

8. Guy For That (feat. Luke Combs)

9. Nosedive (feat. Lainey Wilson)

10. Losers (feat. Jelly Roll)

11. Devil I've Been (feat. ERNEST)

12. Never Love You Again (feat. Sierra Ferrell)

13. Missin' You Like This (feat. Luke Combs)

14. California Sober (feat. Chris Stapleton)

15. Hide My Gun (feat. Hardy)

17. M-E-X-I-C-O (feat. Billy Strings)
